website_summaries.verdict: A great value in terms of sound quality, battery life and comfort for these Bluetooth headphones.
pros: Great sound quality for the price in these comfortable headphones
Good volume level and can be worn with glasses
Impressive battery life at close to 9 hours

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for jogging / running!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! I purchased them because I am starting to run and my standard iPhone headphones kept falling out of my ears. These fit snugly around my ear and stay in place without any adjustment needed over the course of my several mile run. The bluetooth pairing works great, it is easy to adjust the volume, great sound, and the battery life seems excellent so far. Just the other day I got caught in the rain while running and thus unintentionally tested that rain had no negative impact on these! Attached is a video showing onboxing and initial pairing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Frenz

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds ever  and super  affordable prices
customer_reviews.text: These wireless headphones are definitely amazing. You are able to go wireless much further than any other set of earbuds I have had before otium have clear crisp sound. The comfort and fit is also a grate plus . I definitely love this set and highly recommend them. I believe that for the price, these are undeniably a higher class and quality. Oh and forgot to mention this otium headphones are sweat Proof. So if you are a gym rat like my,you just found the best work out buddy. I just love my earbuds soooo very much.
customer_reviews.author: Blahhhlalalopez

customer_reviews.title: I haven't found any earbuds that stay in my ears ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't found any earbuds that stay in my ears. These stay in my ears. The loop is painless and doesn't feel uncomfortable, and allows me total freedom while I listen to anything on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: neptune mick

customer_reviews.title: Good value, clear sound
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use these headphones for working out. Sound is excellent, Bluetooth is flawless - including call clarity the few times I've used it - and they seem to hold a charge for the stated 8-9 hours of continuous play. Save some $$$ and get these! Update: These started acting odd - disconnecting from Bluetooth and then shutting down - after about a month of use. Seemed to happen most when working out, possibly a moisture issue as normal function returned after a day or two. Now, two months into use, they refuse to connect to my phone or other Bluetooth devices at all. I've contacted Otium about a replacement. Will update when I hear back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The way music was meant to be heard
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of Bluetooth headphones I’ve ever used these have amazing sound quality and the songs that are meant to have a hard hitting base in them sounds incredible I only wish I would’ve known about these before I spent a stupid amount of money on my Beats because these are extremely superior to those. I will be buying more of these 💯 if you’re a music lover look no further you will never be unhappy with the sound quality this is how everyone should be able to experience listening to their favorite songs this is most definitely how music is meant to be heard 5 stars aren’t quite enough I give them 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Shanna White

customer_reviews.title: One side doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Just got in the mail and the right side doesn't work at all. Returning and getting different brand. Edit****they sent me a different pair and u never ended up returning the other ones. No idea where they went. Anyways I've had them ever since and they're pretty decent. I use them on a regular basic.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Everyday gym use!
customer_reviews.text: I had another cheap pair of wireless headphones but those blow those out of the water! I love the sound and how you can control your music from the ear piece. I don't have a problem with these slipping off or anything as they fit secure around my ears. I've been using these at the gym for about 2 months now & I really love them. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SusieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Broke inmediately
customer_reviews.text: It didnt last a month! One day stoped charging and dont work anymore
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Battery died, got a free replacement
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 2/26/2019: I received the replacement headphones and they've been working perfectly fine so far. I'll update the review later if there are any other issues. UPDATE 2/12/2019: In response to this review, customer service has reached out to me about sending a replacement. I'll continue to update the review when I receive the replacement and after using it. ORIGINAL REVIEW: These headphones worked great for about 3 months until the battery died. It no longer turns on and it won't charge at all. I reached out to the seller for customer support and all they did is tell me to try a different charging cable, which definitely isn't the issue. I don't think these headphones are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Poor longevity
customer_reviews.text: I received these headphones on December 2nd but the left speaker contained static within the 2nd week. Also, the headphones malfunctioned within a month and I had to purchase another brand. I received this brand of headphones as a gift in December 2017 and they lasted about 9-10 months, within in the 6th or 7th month there was shortage in the cord which caused for the left speaker operate only when the cord was placed in a certain position; and it malfunctioned within the 10th month. I guess that should've been a sign not to purchase this brand but I did because of the longevity. I will not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: one side goes bad after a month or so!
customer_reviews.text: Good headset, although i found a cheaper ($10) exact product that looks and performs exact like this one, i still think that for $15 this is good keeper. Updated review: (after using 3 months) I am taking down the stars because one of the two earbuds, the right side one, has almost lost its volume totally. This has been going on for past 10 days. I didn't notice it initially thinking that it was a song recording gone bad or sometimes its hard to tell since one side works well. Now i clearly know that the right side earbud has gone faulty. I would not recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Sath.N.

customer_reviews.title: Owned multiple - Fails in weeks, 2-3 months at most, of continued usage. Barely water resistant
customer_reviews.text: (UPDATE) Time between failure has now moved to weeks if used daily - too many alternatives with similar design and often lower cost to even consider this product. Hard to believe but quality is going downhill form a low start. Have had a couple of pairs and both were the same quality. Sound and noise blocking are limited as expected for something at this price level, however had hoped for decent moisture resistance (not immersion). Both pairs failed in 2-3 months of near daily usage of an hour or two. Essentially you are $7-8/mo for usage and assumed replacement after 2-3 mo.
customer_reviews.author: manray

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones... the are comfortable and had good sound. The do a good job of blocking out of the sound around you... no noise cancelling but their fit aids in that function. They come with a nice carrying case. They charge relatively quickly... just over an hour for full charge and last for many hours of constant listening. The waterproof feature is great... on the treadmill or out in the rain... they keep working. The have a flat cable connecting them. so far.. one of my favorite ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sounds GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how comfortable these headphones are on my ears. I've worn many other headphones that just wont set comfortably correct in my ears. These come with 3 different size ear tips. One will surely be the right size for you. The sound is also GREAT! You can clearly hear what you are listening to. Nice full rounded stereo base when you are listening to music and nice clear voice when you are on a call. There is no static or outside noises. The price is extremely reasonable at $19.99. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: NO BASS
customer_reviews.text: Pour sound quality and absolutely NO BASS. Fine for talk shows but if you like music spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: low battery warning will make you hate yourself for buying these
customer_reviews.text: 2/10, would not buy again but would wish on my worst enemy. I would say these are fine for cheap headphones for private listening at home while walking away from a device. however, the "noise cancellation" is horrible, and more importantly: the POWER ON / DEVICE CONNECTED / LOW BATTERY messages seem to blare at full volume, regardless of what you've set. so be prepared to be in pain whenever those messages fire if you've made the mistake of having them in your ear when they go off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality waterproof headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and sound quality, unlike other sets I've owned the ear piece stays firmly in place. I use these at the gym and tend to sweat a lot, I've broken 3 sets of other branded headphones because they couldn't handle the moisture. These have worked perfectly time and time again. I've never fully submerged them in water as I don't have the need but the charge port has a tight gasket so I imagine it's fine. Pairs easily and is very easy to use, I highly recommend them to anyone that needs a dependable headset at a reasonable price. Battery life is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sunyoung Cho

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, unscrupulous company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one set of these headphones and ended up exchanging them just to have issues with the second set as well. They connect, but there's usually no audio in one of the earbuds. When it is connected, there are issues with sound quality. I submitted my review for the last pair, and the company has emailed me twice offering money and gift cards in exchange for removing the bad review. Beware of bad reviews since the company is apparently paying for better ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: 1st pair lasted a year, 2nd pair 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Got these in March 2018 and used them 5-days a week until Mar 2019. Sound in the right earphone was very low. I repaired, etc., and nothing worked. Was going to try a different brand, but (stupidly) went with these. 3-months in, the right earphone went almost silent...again. I'm done w/Otium.
customer_reviews.author: jcampbell474

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to expensive earbuds for working out and sports related activities!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these based on some other reviews I read online and for the money I think they are a great bluetooth headphone set for working out and other sports related activities. The sound quality isn't quite what I would call "audiophile" quality - but overall it's more than adequate for listening to good and clear audio while working out or making/receiving phone calls. These were tested both on an iPhone XS Max as well as a Samsung Galaxy Note 9 with indiscernible differences in sound quality. I've also uploaded a review video so that you can get a little bit more info on what I views as the pros/cons of these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: T is for Tech

customer_reviews.title: Good all around set
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile, but I enjoy music just the same. Pairing these earbuds is quite simple. I could walk around a room with no connectivity issues. The fit and finish is on par or slightly above what you would expect at this price range. The sound produced actually kind of surprised me. They are very base-y. The mids and highs are not crystal clear but overall I am pretty happy with how loud and entertaining they are. If you are looking for something to use to run, lift weights, or listen to ebooks with these are kind of hard to pass up for the price. I do not regret purchasing them one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Otium review Cosmetics and extras of this headset are great. Multiple ear size bud tips provided(4 sets total, including extra small that would fit a child), along with a nifty carrying case that is the perfect size to take it anywhere. USB charging cable provided (you supply charger). The feel and fit was great out of the box for me. The ear loops are soft and firm enough to keep the headset in place during workouts. Range is great. In excess of 50 feet and through multiple walls. Multi device connection setup worked as documented. Run time for me has been consistently a little over 8.5 hours. 5 STARS
customer_reviews.author: gs32

customer_reviews.title: Beats Beats 2
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so My Beats 2 recently started to fall apart and are all need taped. I purchased this pair not expecting what I got which is awesome. Sound quality, power up and off, and design each exceed the quality of Beats 2, the only thing you lose is a microphone if you’re one to Bluetooth phone calls. One other improvement could be the loop size of the over ear piece. Works fine but it’s meant for a giant ear. ****update! They are dead. Never used outside of my work office so no elements etc. just totally dead. Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Terri D

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely fantastic wireless Bluetooth headset. After purchasing the product I liked it so much I bought another set for my son. Both work perfectly and have no issues whatsoever. Connecting them to our iPhones took seconds and the sound is absolutely fantastic. They stay in my ear without issue in the controls work seamlessly with my iPhone. Are use them at the gym every single day and sweat has no impact on them at all, I can’t see why I would ever spend another penny on a more expensive brand when these work perfectly. If anything happens to them in the near future I’ll be sure to update this review. As of right now, I could not be happier
customer_reviews.author: Rafter Man

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: I liked them because the sound quality was good, they were easy to set up and they connect quickly. They work well for phone call and the sound was good. I was able to walk away from the phone to another room and they kept connection. They stayed on because of the loops over my ears so I could hear my music but even using the smallest silicone covers they didn't stay inside my ears all the way and I would have to press them back in every so often to get the best sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Star C

customer_reviews.title: Worth bucks spent
customer_reviews.text: One of the good line of headphones for your bucks . I have also posted the video review of it detailing the feature and the details to it . The bass is goood and nice cancellation is worth the penny . The grip over the ears is very comfortable. Am sure you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jayaraja Jayaraman

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you sweat these are NOT sweatproof
customer_reviews.text: These are supposed to be IPX7 waterproof, however i am a sweater at the gym and after having these for about 6 months the right earbud no longer works. I sweat a lot during workouts, which is what i think broke these. Overall they were ok decent sound quality and always connected to my apple watch no issues, but i was hoping they'd last longer than they did. It would be nice if they were really sweatproof but they are not so false advertisement on otium's part.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Buy the other expensive option, save yourself the sadness
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money on a better pair. The cord is too long inthe back so as you run it either bounces or gets between you and your clothes and pulls. The ear thingsshift, even though there are multiple sizes they still do not seal and the plastic wrap around the ear is the only thing that keeps them in place. The sound quality is shoddy and even with the best reception it skips like an old school Walkman.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: I've spent small fortune on headsets that crap out and simply don't do the job
customer_reviews.text: I've spent small fortune on headsets that crap out and simply don't do the job! I use my headsets primarily for the gym which entails major sweating and jumping around. It never fails! the headsets that I've used in the past flood because of the sweat coming out of my ears and constantly slip out during exercise routines. THESE DO NOT! They sit inside your ear without any movement and they do not flood! These are fantastic and finally solved an annoying issue! If they last a year? I would have gotten my money's worth and will gladly replace them. Best $23 bucks I've ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: Retro Moto

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth earbuds a great value
customer_reviews.text: I go to the gym; run and bike quite often, and these Otium bluetooth earbuds connected well both to my Garmin watch, iPhone and iPod. The headphones are lightweight, and what I liked most about them was how well the earbuds stayed in my ears while running, which has been a problem for me with other brands in the past. Sound quality is very clear and good quality. The earbud controls are easy to understand and are well placed for convenient pairing and power on/off, volume adjustment, and soundtrack control. The battery life is in line with what Otium advertises. I would recommend these earbuds for their excellent value in terms of the quality you receive for the price.
customer_reviews.author: fezfam

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, good volume, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Due to BS that some sellers do, I no longer give 5-star reviews. With that said, I own 3 of these babies. I'm a triathlete and I wear headphones when running. I also am blessed to be able to wear headphones at work - and it's a loud work environment. I find the max volume of these better than average. As for sound quality, these aren't exactly Beats headphones - but I'm willing to sacrifice sound quality for this great price point. Overall I like these, they're a great value. I wish these had a pause button, but that's the only feature this lacks versus my favorite (but more expensive) headphones. I would definitely recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: 3athlt

customer_reviews.title: Good basic blue tooth headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good pair of blue tooth headphones 🎧, a couple of issues though; first the left side had significantly lower volume than the right side, and secondly after turning the headphones off & putting them in the case, many times I woulf find that they had turned themselves back on while in the case. Not good for battery life. However, if they stayed off I got good battery life. I had these for about1.5 years and overall was quite happy with the product, enough so that After this pair was stolen, I replaced them with wireless headphones from the same manufacturer. This particular model is not still available, so I upgraded to wireless.
customer_reviews.author: bkprolix

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones to listen to guided meditations. I do not like them. In addition to being bulky, the keystroke sound is remarkably loud when you first type on your phone. Also, a voice interrupts whatever you are listening to in order to tell you the battery is getting low. The voice repeats itself several times before the battery dies. When it finally dies, it makes a few loud, brief tones as it goes off. When your trying to relax with these earbuds on, all this stuff ruins it.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: Died in six months, bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I used these semi-regularly for six months when they stopped working. Dealing with customer service was a big hassle - they replied to my initial inquiry with a message saying they were going on vacation for ten days, then when they finally got back to me (well more than ten days later), they tried to hit me up for shipping and were very whiny about it. Eventually I got my replacement headphones but it was several months after my claim. These are average, but I'd never buy them again due to the poor customer service of the company.
customer_reviews.author: George Cauldron

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality product for a great price! Extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones!!!! They are sooo comfortable and they never fall out of my ears no matter what I am doing. Sound is fantastic coming thru them. No one ever complains they can't hear me if I can on a call with them. I have them on all day every day listening to music, streaming videos, or talking on the phone. The charge lasts for days! I loved them so much, I ended up ordering 3 more pairs (in total 2 black ones, 1 blue one, and 1 pink one). I ordered the extra 3 pairs so each of my kids could have one. No complaints from any of my 3 kids either! Good value for price!
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones died after a few times of using them, I just decided to switch over to wired until I can invest in better wireless headphones. A shame, because the sound quality was not bad and they fit perfectly, the battery just stopped working out of nowhere and wouldn’t charge after a few uses. Edit: they have replaced my old pair with a working pair overall great stuff
customer_reviews.author: College student

customer_reviews.title: Rocking Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I have purchased them three times- because I have lost them twice. But, love them enough that once I lose them I go forth and buy them again. They are perfect for jogging and flights. Easy to charge in any USB port, they come in a great carrying case. The bluetooth easily connects with my iPhone. I know the current trend is EarPods, but the wire connecting them helps me from losing them even more frequently. If these get misplaced then I anticipate buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ealanbrock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these earbuds now for 8 months abs workout with them and mtb with them. They have been great. Bluetooth is solid as long as you are around 25 ft or less. Sound quality is good and acceptable, but not great. The wire in between the buds is sometimes annoying the way it curls and twists s as be needs to be readjusted often. The earbuds do stay in place very well and are secure for activities like mtb biking, running and working out. So far they have been totally sweatproof as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ty6897

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: So I sit at a desk all day, so no strenuous activity at all. The headphones don't stay in my ears well, which could just be attributed to ear shape but I've never had an issue before with other around the ear buds. They also do NOT noise cancel at all. you can hear everything that is going on around you. I was able to deal with all of this anyway, until last week, the sound started going in and out. and now one bud is completely dead so I only have sound on one side and now today that started cutting out. good thing they're cheap
customer_reviews.author: RG3829

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound
customer_reviews.text: I needed some technical help to install these earphones, though once installed they have worked perfectly. When combined with my 10" HD Tablet, the sound clarity is outstanding. The earphones are comfortable to wear. Sound quality is maintained for 20 - 30 feet from the tablet depending on intervening walls, trees, etc. The battery is amazing; must be smaller than a pencil eraser while is good for several hours of music listening. I don't know if it is replaceable which could be a problem when it gives out.
customer_reviews.author: W. D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones for the gym or any other place!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this headset for the past 6 weeks and can report that it’s is likely the best value for a wireless headphone on Amazon. The connection is seamless and simple (I’m on an iPhone 6s +) the sound is very good even in a noisy gym environment and the battery lasts a very long time. I use it several times a week at the gym and it seems to be holding up in that environment without ay issues. So if you’re in the market for a Bluetooth headset for the gym I would strongly encourage you to consider this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sat_Sonic

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting headphones at great price!
customer_reviews.text: These wireless headphones are great! They fully charged in less than one hour and the battery lasted about 8ish hours over the span of one week of use. The headphones come with a hard-shell case and a set of alternate earbuds to accommodate for different ear sizes but I only used the regular size. They fit snugly in your ear and I used them while running with no problems. They are attached to one another which I like, since I can hang them around my neck when I need to take them off briefly. Overall, I would definitely recommend these headphones since the battery lasts long and they are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: First all easy to connect i use a Samsung android budget not to expensive and this earbuds are not bad for the sound and the conectuivy and don't fall out when I use them normally use them for working out better than most average 50 Dollars wireless earbuds I use this way better than. the soundpests truengine than I had because they kept falling of my ears but not these ones beside love the carrying case and the extra eartips amazing beside the fact that 1 year warranty :) if they ever break I get free replacements or can easily buy another set
customer_reviews.author: Fidel Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones.  Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I frequently have a problem with the fit and comfort of ear buds. Others I have tried will hurt my ears in a short time. However these are great. The over the ear pieces are soft and flexible. The earbuds come in three sizes. I was surprised when I felt the default buds felt the most secure and comfortable, but choices are included. The sound is great too. Full range of bass and treble compared to what I’m used to. The controls are responsive and easy to learn. Plus these are relatively inexpensive. I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: Better than others priced at $150.
customer_reviews.text: The best price for quality. The real deal. Better than the $150 earbuds. I went through 6 different pairs of earbuds priced at $100 to $150 and none of them worked more than a week. They all sucked. Someone mentioned these and I decided to try. I've had for over 2 weeks and they work great. Quite honestly I was disgusted with the wireless bluetooth market. I'm so glad I found these. Oh.. and don't buy anything that is called dre powerbeats. 1 ,2 or 3. They all are crap and overpriced with apple charging for a deposit to use the warranty. They are a scam.
customer_reviews.author: dan ralls

customer_reviews.title: Incredible. On par or better than AirPods
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased dozens of headphones, wired and wireless, in ear, over ear, cheap and seriously expensive (AirPods and Audiotech, for example). These are, hands down, some of the best I have ever purchased. The bass is incredible, the clarity superb and when I use them interchangeably with my AirPods I honestly prefer the otium. They fit amazingly well and are exceptionally well designed to stay on your head. The newer models have an even better quality cord and feel so they are really comfortable. I bought 3 pairs for my kids and I for 1/3 the price of one pair of airpods. That’s all I need to say. Seriously awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!!
customer_reviews.text: These bluetooth headphones were very easy to set up (had perfect size choices for the tips for comfort), charge and pair with my iPhone! The instructions were very clear and easy to figure out. Once these were charged and paired with my phone then the fun began. The sound that these little headphones provided was amazing! I could listen fairly loudly and there was no leakage of sound to disturb those around me! Love the carrying case with the clip which will make them very easy to travel with! I highly recommend these bluetooth headphones - they sound as good, if not better than many that are much more expensive!!
customer_reviews.author: msp55

customer_reviews.title: Sound good when working properly
customer_reviews.text: When they play properly, the sound is good. But they often cut in and out like the wire connection isn't good and that of course interrupts viewing and very frustrating. I purchased them October 23, 2018. This December 3, 2018. They've been doing this for about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: HSP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ear buds for my girlfriend. She works at house keeping. And she says she loves them. Their comfortable in the ear and they stay in pretty well. The battery last her more than all the shift. Their nice and lite weight. I tried them out my self. And the sound on them are pretty good for the price of these ear buds. So if you're trying to get something on the cheaper side that's works and sounds good. Then these ear buds are for you
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy ownby

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds with great customer support.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds had amazing sound quality and good battery life. Easy to use and quick to pair with my phone. However, the pair I ordered wouldn’t turn on at all no matter what I tried after a period of about 2 months. But Otium sent me a brand new pair and so far those ones are working great. I have other Otium products that have been working forever, so I’m guessing it was a fluke. Great products so far. :)
customer_reviews.author: TrailSender

customer_reviews.title: Colours other than black are not noise canceling!!
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed my sister's set and loved them. In order to not get confused I bought a pink set rather than a black set not realizing that they're actually completely different. The pink ones do not have any noise cancellation ability at all. While they stay in my ears just fine and don't fall off I didn't really want just another set of headphones. I guess I should have read through the complete description of the pink set rather than just assuming that they were the same. But I am annoyed that they're listed together as if the colours don't matter.
customer_reviews.author: vermontsnowboarder

customer_reviews.title: Second pair. That's it. That's the review.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these in 2017. That I liked them enough to purchase a second pair is probably the review. My current purchase will replace them since there is now a skip in the sound and static (maybe because I left them in my pocket when doing laundry). I like the way this model's earbuds curve even more to fit securely in my ear. The sound quality is as strong as the first set and pairing with my phone was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: ReadWriteRepeat

customer_reviews.title: They are one size fits all. They DO NOT adjust!
customer_reviews.text: They do not adjust! They are one size fits all. I can not speak to the quality of these because they don’t fit me. They are now only taking up space in my husbands drawer on the off chance he may want to give them a try sometime. I purchased these to replace ones of the same brand that I’d lost an ear piece to. My old ones adjust so you can make them as snug as you want. These don’t. My ear canal is shaped a bit funny on the right. I’ve never been able to wear earbuds until the adjustable ones came along. Back to my search!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2nd set of blue tooth buds. The first set had a small control box on the cable connecting the two ear pieces. The weight of the box was enough to be a bother. So I tried these and like them much better. The sound quality isn't fantastic and there is some issues with the signal coming in at times, but I think that's just a bluetooth thing. If you want better buds, you'll probably have to pay a good bit more than you will for these. These are good enough for me. I use them when I'm running.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Timbers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have excellent crisp sound and are almost as good as the Bose Quiet Comfort 25 Noise cancellation ones. I was able to use these with my vacuum turned on and barely heard the vacuum in the background. Using the larger earplugs that came with the headphones, they don't fall out of my ears. Battery life has been excellent, 10 hours so far with multiple uses at the gym they still haven't needed a charge. For the $25 price with tax they are an excellent buy. There is a volume adjustment button on the right headphone. These could be improved by adding next track functionality.
customer_reviews.author: mmbmca

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have used these earbuds for less than 1 year. From day 1 I never got 9hrs of battery life the manufacturer claims. Within several month the earbuds started cutting in and out during my runs. Several weeks later started having issues getting these to charge. Now this week the left earbud has stopped working all together. With this many issues so early on I can not recommend these to anyone else and will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: BdogPound

customer_reviews.title: They fit me great right out of the box...I did not even have to change the ear cushions.
customer_reviews.text: They fit me great right out of the box...I did not even have to change the ear cushions. Everything works as stated in the summary. I wish I could get up to five hours continuously out of a pair of these but that seems not possible for any of these type at this time. Have not had them long enough to know the durability but they seem to be pretty durable as I have worn them doing a lot of outside work and they have shown no sign of wear. I recommend them as a solid purchase from my perspective.
customer_reviews.author: D4mitchTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Best ear buds I've had (I stay <$30)
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They're comfortable and they sound great for $25 ear buds. Compared to other (similarly priced) brands I've gone through, they're WAY better. They don't have buttons that constantly get pressed by accident, which has been the case with every other set I've had. The battery life is good- and when it gets low, I get a few warnings over a few minutes time (5 minutes maybe?) before they shut off, but it's not an annoying "battery low" reminder every 5 seconds the way other sets have been (maybe once every minute or two). Buying a second pair for my kid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it, for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a year now. The battery is starting to get fussy (lasts about 3.5 to 4 hours per charge). The Bluetooth connection to the phone will sometimes go in and out (I just got a new phone and it hasn't improved this issue, therefore it's the headphones). Having said all that, for less than $20 I have been very happy with these. Well worth the price. If they were still as good as when I first got them, I would say that they were worth 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones, great travel case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these instead of expensive and bulky headphones. These are great for the gym, work and air travel. They stay in place and are easy to operate! And a handy travel case is included.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great sound & so comfy
customer_reviews.text: These little ear buds are awesome! They came very well packaged and shipped super fast. Enclosed with the ear buds are a nice zippered case which has a cabernet hook, charging usb cable and 3 different sizes of covers. They are super soft and super light. I wore them at the beach. All noise was blocked out and the sound quality is excellent. I had no problem with them falling off my ears. I could not tell that I had them on because of them being so light. As I walked the beach and picked up sharks teeth the ear buds stayed in place with no movement at all. Best Ear buds I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Lann Taylor

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, hands up.
customer_reviews.text: These were my go-to earbuds before I tried the wireless earbuds. I have a habit of wearing them around my neck when they are not in my ears. This is a no-no for me since they get caught in my clothing & are “pulled”, which in turn ruins the connection & makes them useless. All that is my fault. Now I faithfully use the case that comes with them. These have the best battery life of all the earbuds I’ve tried. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MoJo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wireless Bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I like to tell you about these, Bluetooth headphones. They are awesome. I don't know how "beets" (spelled wrong on purpose) are but these headphones are great. It never tells me, when I need to charge it. probably does. I use them all day. I plug them in at night. In the morning, ready to go. This is my second set being that my first set was stolen. if you're looking for a reliable and feel good headset. Look no further. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ecbanasco

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I happen to have weirdly small ears so I've struggled to find blue tooth earbuds that work for me at the gym. I got these to use instead of my Beats which were just to heavy for the gym. What I lost in sound quality and noise cancellation is balanced out by the weight and they stay in my ears even running. While the curved piece that goes around the ear is useless and comes in no contact with my ear. with the smallest covering they fit and stay in. I don't mind the wire either.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones that stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I have these headphones paired with my computer and tablet and they work great. Sound quality is very good, I've used them to listen to music, TV, movies and while playing PC games. They charge quickly and the included case is nice (includes a carabiner on the case which has been handy). The noise cancelling aspect of the headphones is good enough that I caution people against using them while driving or biking.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth headset sound amazing. They have great base/treble sound for all types of music. They are way louder then any person should have in there ears for a great price. As far as taking calls, I had no problems with hearing the people that I was talking to and when I asked them how I sounded, they said they can hear me great. This was done mainly in a quiet setting, so I cant say how they sound with wind or things like that. To end I'm so happy with these that I bought two more to send to family members.
customer_reviews.author: My opinions only

customer_reviews.title: They are fine.
customer_reviews.text: They work fine. Not good at reducing wind noise while on a bike doing 20 mph.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: These are Great Ear Buds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a while back and they worked great for what I need them for. I like that they have the strap running between them because when I don't have them in my ears I can hang them around my neck. I accidentally lost my last pair on my motorcycle the other night. I forgot to put them in my ears and left them hanging around my neck and when I took off the Wind blew them off. But hey they were so good that I decided to buy them a second time!
customer_reviews.author: A_Ninja_Racer

customer_reviews.title: Muffled sound
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this product . Best prime day deal ever. But to my surprise the sound is very muffled and bass is too high not sure what’s wrong. Thought it might be good since it has been in prime day deal . I wish the sound was good. The connectivity at first was good but then 2nd try it connected but no sound. Overall not very happy with sound quality. Design and earbud fits well but sound is no go.
customer_reviews.author: Couponkay

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting a pair of bluetooth headphones to wear to the gym and didn't want to fork out $100 for Beats or similar. I'm really happy with these. I love music and play music so I'm particular about sound quality. For the price, you can't beat these. They don't have a ton of low end but they have enough to suit me. They also do a great job of fitting in my ears and not falling off. The earpiece is a soft gel that doesn't irritate.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great for late night TV watching
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to allow me to watch TV late at night without disturbing my neighbors. They synched perfectly with my Samsung TV, whereas similar earbuds by JBL and Philips (at twice the price of the Otium) would synch, but the audio was noisy and chopped up. I've purchased a second set from Otium and am equally satisfied as with the first set of earbuds. BTW, the JBL, Philips and Otium all sound fine when listening to music from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: EDGARD ACEVEDO

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE, FANTASTIC QUALITY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. For the price I was amazingly impressed. I never expected to get such a high quality product for the price I paid. It was very easy to use. Connecting took moments and I honestly never even read the small manual. It arrived very quickly, was packed very well and everything about it is high quality. It even came with a carrying case. It also has a USB charger with it. Overall I love it. Great value for the quality, the simplicity and sound. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Quackenbush

customer_reviews.title: went through washer and dryer and still works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I've purchased. I have used the first pair for over a year and they got a short, because I was always mistreating them the second pair I've had for several months and use mainly for water aerobics and at the gym. I left them in the pocket of my work-out pants and washed them and dried them in the dryer on medium heat ( by accident of course) for over an hour. I was so upset but when I tried them they still worked perfectly and the battery was still charged wow was I amazed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound quality for the price of the unit
customer_reviews.text: The earphone came with a nice black shell case to carry around in pocket/backpacks. The battery life is good, I used it to listen to a 9 hr audiobook and it shut itself off around 7hr 45min (using 50% volume). The sound is good for the price (~20$), the pairing is very quick (3-4 sec after the 1st pairing). The connection distance is very good (in line of sight >20ft), with 1wall in between, ~10ft). The reason I took 1 star off is that it hurt my ear after extended wearing (>5hrs) . I will update later to see how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Wu

customer_reviews.title: For the Price, These headphones are terrific
customer_reviews.text: I have had these wireless headphones for about 6 months. They continue to work and I recharge them at least once a week. They paired to my tablet and computer easily. I am going to order a 2nd pair for my computer; the price and value are good. I had a pair of Sports type earbuds that were twice the cost, and when I'd lean against a headrest or pillow, one or both sides would pop out of my ears. Not the Otium! They don't hurt my ears and they stay in place. The sound quality is good, too.
customer_reviews.author: JMFDC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for running and watching a movie on my phone . Very happy with quality of product, pairing was easy . Charged quickly . Another review gave it very positive experience and that was very helpful and I agree with it thus far . Have it less than a week . Still figuring out with running which is best ear size on side which is a little heavier cause of technical unit piece ( control button ) . For the price , this is fantastic. I don’t do reviews of products often but this is very deserving .
customer_reviews.author: D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 4 months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: When I got these they were great... but they stopped working 4 months after I bought them. They just stopped working. I didn’t drop them or step on them or break them in any way. One day they worked the next day they didn’t. UPDATE: Otium customer service contacted me and sent a replacement pair of headphones. I’m very pleased with this company and would definitely purchase products from them in the future. I received the new headphones and they work great. I will update 4 months from now to let people know how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: T. Crapser

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up to have a pair of headphones to drown out the noise at work and they have pleasantly surprised me. I have purchased headphones from Otium before to use and the gym and they worked well. I went for these for the hooks as I figured I would war them longer and would be more comfortable. I do have large ears but had no discomfort wearing these for 3-4 hours. I also like that my phone can tell me the battery level, while note completely accurate its close enough to let me know when I need to recharge them.
customer_reviews.author: Jiten Patel

customer_reviews.title: Died after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly fine for 4 months. Now, it disconnects randomly every 10 seconds. Sometimes it just buzzes and overloads my ears. When it does work, the sound will cut out in one of the ears. Cheap; you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay on well with glasses. Good value and quality. Will probably work better for someone with bigger ears and who does not where glasses.
customer_reviews.author: toenail

customer_reviews.title: I was Impressed from the moment I pressed play
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first bluetooth headset, but although I have enjoyed other wireless this brand has been by far the best quality. -Unlike others once off your ears the music is not heard. -lightWeight -confortable fit around ear (does not irritate inner ear after extended use time) -brings replacable rubber ends I fully charged it before first use: -long battery life -comes with a cute little pouch to safe keep all the items. I truly recomend this product
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Amazing what you get for what you pay for. Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, these headphones are amazing! I mean for the price and the durability oh, I've had these for roughly two and a half years now, I would buy these over and over again. It's amazing how long these low-budget headphones have lasted me, the numerous workouts and heavy use they still have not broken. I literally throw them in my bag and don't have to worry about them, highly recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: rahul

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, only wish the cord were longer
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually quite impressed with the sound quality and pink look to this cutie. Customer service was also exceptional. My only dissatisfaction is that the cord is a bit too short/awkward. I find that I only have one of the ear pieces in the other hangs very awkwardly and when I have both in it feels a bit awkward at times too. Just always feels like they might fall out but they don't so maybe it's me :) I'm also used to more buttons/volume adjustment on neckback bluetooths. Nevertheless, connects great. I haven't been able to tell if I can connect two phones simultaneously which I do appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Lisi

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable quality for a shockingly low price
customer_reviews.text: The fit is surprisingly soft and seamless, and incredibly light, especially with the varied ear piece sizes included in the box, it gives the user an opportunity to get a secure, true one-to-one fit. The design of the earbuds is sleek and modern, directing the attention directly to what you're hearing, rather than what you're feeling (which is how it should be). It was so refreshing to hear something so precise in clarity and bass response, because I have had several earbuds/headphones that delivered that bass but lacked in clarity or vice versa. But in these, I found a great balance.Remarkable quality for a shockingly low price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a great product !
customer_reviews.text: I first gotta say it's a great product, I've bought other Bluetooth earbuds and never had a better experience than with these earbuds! Sound quality is amazing, the battery life lasts so long it seems like it doesn't die and it stays attached and is very difficult to fall out of your ears and they come with a little pouch that you can clip to your belt buckle and carry with you. Anytime I need a new pair which has happened twice now since I end up carelessly leaving the earbuds out and my cat loves to bite wires, I always buy another pair of these earbuds! 10/10 great product definitely worth the price instead of buying $200 beats.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Prefer over AirPods!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite headphones. This is my second pair! I even prefer them to the Apple AirPods. Because I like the cord piece that can easily let you hang the headphones around your neck when you’re not using them. Most women’s clothes don’t have pockets so when I’m not using AirPods, I’m stuck holding them if I don’t have my purse on me, like when I’m walking around work. These are great! Sound quality is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: great sound at great price
customer_reviews.text: as a part-time musician sound quality is important to me. I have less expensive plain otium & they work fine for talking/radio, etc. but there is a huge difference with music & these are clearly much better. For the price they're top-notch, & if something happens to them--they're not $200 loss! use them daily for workouts--stay put & music quality is excellent. I'll buy more
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Portable
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set that I've purchased using the Otium product. Battery life is decent along with almost no physical weight...perfect for being mobile. The sound quality is as good as your Bluetooth signal source. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like these headphones. Of course you aren't getting Beats quality sound, but for the price the sound quality is quite good. The pairing was easy and fast, they are comfortable behind the ear and don't fall off when in use. Also, when talking to people using the microphone, the sound quality to the person on the other end is outstanding - they couldn't even tell I wasn't talking into my phone. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Gail C Strong

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I have used the more expensive earphones from Bose and Sony. I would definitely recommend this earphone for this price. Build quality is really awesome and the wires don't tangle. The best part is the battery life which is unreal for a $20 wireless earphone and better than Bose SoundSport Wireless Headphones. If I compare Bose SoundSport Wireless Headphones and this earphone, the sound quality is where it lags slightly. That said, it has very decent sound quality and is totally acceptable for me. I used it for my gym every day and have to less worry about charging it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: The Right Earbuds for the Right Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of ear buds. The battery literally lasts all day. They’re easy to pair with whatever device you have. Audio quality on the speakers and on the mic are amazing. You can’t go wrong with these for the money. I bought these to replace a set that had played out. I went through two other sets with various issues before landing on these. I’m glad I picked Otium.
customer_reviews.author: L. D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bluetooth earbud-type headphones! I love music, but am not super picky about sound in headphones, but these sound great! They stay on my ears and it is so nice to not have a cord in the way, this is my first pair of bluetooth headphones. I bought 5 pair of these as gifts, as well as my pair. So far, everyone is happy with the gift. They connect very easily to our phones, all iPhones. I've also paired them to my MacBook and iMac. I would highly recommend these for sound quality and ease of use!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Cheap to buy, impossible to use
customer_reviews.text: In the instructions, under How to Connect. it says I need a wireless headphone, and a Bluetooth device (evidently a Smartphone). Under Multi-pairing, and Reconnect the headphone, it has more instructions for the Phone. It does provide the necessary cabling and USB port. But I don't understand everything that is going on here. I do not have a Wireless headphone or a Smartphone, so I cannot use this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product for a terrific price
customer_reviews.text: These have worked out really, really well! The sound quality is terrific, and I have zero issues connecting with my iPad and Note 9. They seem to have a solid build; they aren't going to break anytime soon. I have had some bad luck with several pairs of bluetooth headphones, and was hesitant to give it another go, but I'm glad I gave it a shot with this brand! So far so good! Edit: They have a mic and work great for taking calls as well, which I love!
customer_reviews.author: Will R

customer_reviews.title: Work and sound great for working out
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the quality and price. BT has a good range on it without cutting out. I can walk use them on a basketball court and not lose signal which has happened with other more expensive models I've used previously. I can set my phone down and walk the entire length of the workout area and not lose signal. Using it for phone calls it seems to work really well as well. no complaints from the other end on inability to hear or reports of it sounding distant.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Long

customer_reviews.title: Superb wireless earbuds for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wireless earbuds if you on a budget. Especially if you go through earbuds quick these are really good for the price. Connects fast n connection is always stable. I had cheap wireless earbuds and the real cheap ones always seem to disconnect quick or just drop connection when I move around. These Optium are far Worthy to be considere cheap just because of the price. I wear for running, lifting, or when I'm at work. Scale 1-5. Sound quality 4.5 Bass 4.2 , not too bassy but hits the bass right. Mids 4.5 Highs 4.5.
customer_reviews.author: Ultra Mario

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit, can hear all outside noise.
customer_reviews.text: It automatically turns off at like 30% battery. The ear buds don't stay in my ears. The sound quality isn't the best and I can here everything around me. When I turn them and the sound is high, it doesn't automatically adjust so I don't become deaf. I guess I'm just used to my PLUMSOTT earbuds. They are soooo much better, but they were out of them on Amazon. ;((
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well
customer_reviews.text: Very very very good for the price it sticks to your ear while working out the battery life is very very good I charged it for 1 and 1/2 hours and used it for good 30 minute run The build quality seems to be pretty well made while wearing it looks very expensive I enjoy using it do recommended product
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hero

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bluetooth headphone for gymers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my bf to use in the gym. He said these headphones are a bit hard on his ears comparing to the old ones he owned but they are relatively comfortable and have a good volume range. They have decent bass but the treble and highs are muddy and not very clear. Pairing is super easy, operation even easier. Overall, I don't think you can beat the sound for the price and it works well for most activities my bf does.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Really great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I was at first skeptical about these headphones for the price and figured that they would not be that great. I was amazed at how wrong I was! The headphones work wonderfully, keep a long charge, stay on when I run, are very easy to figure out how to pair with my phone, and love that they come with a nice carrying case for the headphones and the extra ear pieces. They work great for myself who has very small ears as well as my husband who has bigger ears and has a hard time getting headphones to stay on when running. Wonderful purchase and excited for how well they work!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Kassner

product_meta.title: Otium Wireless Headphones, Bluetooth Headphones, Best Sports Earbuds, IPX7 Waterproof Stereo Earphones for Gym Running 9 Hours Playtime Noise Cancelling Headsets
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Enjoy Music Even You Sweat
With the development of science and technology, Otium wireless earbuds could be protected well with IPX7 even when you are running, jogging, hiking and biking! 
Stereo High Sound Quality
According to the market research and technical efforts, Otium bluetooth headphones have upgraded the sound quality, providing a stereo sound with superb bass sound and mid. Let you immerse yourself in the music world! 
Find The Most Comfortable Angle
Ergonomically eartip design, arc ear hanger and three different sizes of earplugs, Otium wireless headphones bring you a comfortable wearing experience, help you find the most suitable angle! 
*Attention: 
<1> Please use the standard 5V/1A charging plug to charge the headphones.
<2> Please don't charge the headphone in your car or use fast charger, otherwise the headphone may broken because of the unstable voltage or excessive current. 
<3> Please notice that the charging voltage must be not exceed 5.5V and the charging current must not exceed 3A. 
Warranty:
Every Otium Headphones has 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty and 60 days no-questions-asked money back & return policy. 
Specifications: 
Bluetooth Standard: V4.1
Waterproof Rating: IPX7
Operating Range: About 10m (30ft)
Standby Time: 240hrs
Charging Time: 1.5hrs
Talk /Playing Time: 8-9hrs
Sound: HD Sound and Richer Bass
Package Contents: 
Otium Headphone x 1
Regular Ear Tips(S, M, L) x 3 Pairs
Cord clip x 1
Carrying Case x 1
Charging Cable x 1
feature_bullets: ♬【TRUE HD BEATS HIGH FIDELITY SOUND】Update Bluetooth Headphones own LATEST Bluetooth 4.1 CSR technology and IMPROVE acoustic components that produce incredible sound quality with deep bass and crystal clear treble.

♬【IPX-7 WATERPROOF RATING】With ergonomic design and silicone ear hooks, wireless headphones secure stay on your ears, feel great to wear and will never fall out. Upgraded Waterproof Rating, 100% prevents ordinary splashing water and rain.

♬【LONGEST BATTERY LIFE】The new improved lithium polymer battery allows seamless enjoyment of music for up to 9 hours and 240 hours stand-by with a charge of only 1.5 hours. Neckband design prevents troublesome wires from tangling during your workout.

♬【CVC 6.0 NOISE SUPPRESSION TECHNOLOGY】 Connect seamlessly with all Bluetooth enabled devices up to 30 feet （10m） away. With Noise Suppression Technology reduce background noise. So you can focus on your favorite music, no matter where you are.

♬【ONE BUTTON CONTROL】 Allows Skip/Play/Pause on your music tracks as well as all phone use without reaching your phone. This wireless headphones also the best choice for your Christmas or New Year gift list!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,636 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Manufacturer: Shenzhen Huan qiu yi tong technology Co,.Ltd
